Name: NA.NO
About the game: You can fantasize on the positive aspects of an injected nanobot helping a living host to surpass some common or uncommon accidents, infections or diseases caused by other types of living organisms. This beta version of the game will allow you to confront the organic menace in a survival mode as a solo nanobot or with a friend in a co-op experience. Each year gets a little tougher to cleanse the host of any organic menace. Enter the laboratory and take on the experience as you wish. Let the kids play and enjoy an easy experience: -Enable immunity of the organism. -Deactivate the COVID-19 virus or other organic menace. -Team up with another nanobot in local co-op play or using Steam's Remote Play Together. -Get instant access to major upgrades of your nanobot and enjoy a minimal stress free game. Get it tough, and prepare to face the years. -Three level of difficulty to get you challenged. -Face five different types of enemies, including the COVID-19 virus . -Unlock new weapons and new capabilities ONLY when you gather the special hormones required for activation.
